headline: AppLovin Stock Rallies After Rough Start To Year. Here's Why.
summary: AppLovin stock climbed Friday following a report that the advertising technology company is pursuing plans for a new social media platform.  AppLovin was among companies that made a bid for TikTok's U.S. business last year.  AppLovin's potential social network plans were first reported by Bloomberg Thursday.
